resources.string:
Experience the nostalgia with our Snake game, inspired by the classic Nokia version. Navigate the snake, avoid obstacles, and collect apples to grow longer. Challenge yourself to beat your high score in this timeless arcade game.

Features:
• Simple and intuitive controls
• Classic gameplay with physical keyboard
• High score tracking for endless competition

How to Play:
Use the arrow keys to move the snake. Avoid running into the snake's own tail. Eat apples to increase your score and the snake's length.

Feedback:
We love hearing from our players! If you have any suggestions or feedback, please contact us.
